Incorporate these pedagogical elements: - Learning Objectives: [Insert the full learning_objectives array here]. - Scaffolding: Generate 20-30 flashcards distributed across 4 layers (5-8 per layer): Layer 1 Foundation, Layer 2 Components (STIX), Layer 3 Implementation (calculation), Layer 4 Integration. - Active Learning Tie-ins: Reference discussion/peer/problem-solving in explanations. - Bloom's Coverage: Ensure flashcards target all levels (e.g., MCQ for Remember, scenarios for Apply/Create).
